userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Land Grant to John Catlett, 1666 Jun 2, Manuscript # 1982.10.d (3X), John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Copy of a patent in which Berkeley grants Catlett five hundred acres of land in Rappahannock Co., Va. Recorded by Thomas Ludwell. Bears a notation, "Examined by the original and agrees with the record" witnessed by Charles Chiswell. Verso bears deed, 1667 March 2, for the land from Catlett to Henry Corbin witnessed by Peter Temple and Thomas Williamson.
